text: avaru helidaru; nanna janangadavare, nivu noduttiruvira? Nanantu nanna odeyana kadeyinda (bandiruva) spasta puraveyannu anusarisuttiddene. Avanu tanna kadeyinda nanage uttama aharavannu nididdane. Nanu yavudarinda nim'mannu tadeyuttiruveno adannu svatah ullanghisuva irade nanagilla. Nanantu, nanage sadhyaviruvastu mattige sudharaneyannaste bayasuttene. Innu, nanage nanna bhagyavannu niduvavanu allahana horatu bere yaru illa. Nanu avanalle bharavase ittiddene mattu nanu avana kadege maraluttene
